ChunkText: once you enter the us, your official names in all documents are based on your passport, and it becomes much harder to change your name after you arrive.
ContextBefore: if there are any errors in your name in your passport, or if it is structured incorrectly such as not having a first or last name, it is strongly advised that you correct your passport before applying for your US visa.
ContextAfter: students with no first name or no last name in their passport often find this challenging to manage in the us, especially related to work permission, as the US system expects both a first and last name. please take the time to have any errors corrected before applying for your visa!
